summary:
Carriage_Refurb_Replacer_DragonPriest_PhilbyDorro_1 - 2048sq - Gold, Ebony, Moonstone
Alternative to Dibella themed Carriage Refurb_Replacer uploaded previously.
descriptionHtml:
Carriage Refurbishment / Replacer - DragonPriest Theme Retexture 2048x2048 Gold / Ebony / Moonstone.

Usual Drill (for a Replacer) extract the Zipped File to your SkyRim Install directory (ensuring data folder is merged with the existing one) simply delete the .nif files in meshes\\Furniture\\Cart or move them elsewhere to uninstall.

It\'s the 3rd mod i\'ve uploaded, so let me know if any problems, but i think it should be pretty well right. Wouldn\'t have thought too much could go wrong with that.
I didn\'t include the Normal Texture Mapping Files which i left as the default I\'d imagine that the game engine will be able to locate them in the default locations within the SkyRim - Textures.bsa
Should be compatible with all other mods unless they specifically alter the Carriage in other ways.
author: philbydorro
